category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEReplaceAssemblyInContextTemplates
preference.preference_description: Lists the cloning rule names to be used when replacing a subassembly within BOM structures. Valid Values: You can define different rules for different types of items. For example, you can create a custom business object (item type) called x and then create a preference called x.x. ReplaceAssemblyInContext that defines rules for objects of type x that are different from the rules for items of type Item. If you then add x.x.ReplaceAssemblyInContext to MEReplaceAssemblyInContextTemplates, Teamcenter follows those rules.
